text: Were images removed from theme fields?  I just built out a site with this theme two or three weeks ago and had my logo images available, but now that I'm starting another site they're not available.  The theme is still able to reference the placeholder logos just fine, and I don't get any errors when uploading fields.json.

Also I just realized that this theme is _LIVE_ on another client's site.  If they update their logo while this theme is still in use, they won't be able to put it on their site without contacting my employer for support.

A perusal of the documentation shows that image fields are supposedly only supported in modules now.  I'm more than a little miffed that a feature that had been functioning perfectly fine for a month after the launch of Themes got removed.

I'm customising the Sprout theme and the theme-overrides template was fine one day. Now it keeps throwing the error `line -1: IllegalArgumentException: Cannot deserialize value of type com.HubSpot.content.model.customwidgets.fields.data.FontDataIF$FontSet from String "theme.fonts.primary.font_set": value not one of declared Enum instance names: [DEFAULT, GOOGLE]`  and I can't figure out why :cry: I don't see any issues with the primary font on fields.json (I even tried setting it back to the original Work Sans). Has anyone had this issue or know what might be the issue here?
Hi Stephanie - can you try to set the `"variant"` parameter under the default to `"variant": "regular"` instead of the 400 you have there?

Unfortunately not, it throws a new error `line -1: IllegalArgumentException: Cannot construct instance of `com.HubSpot.content.model.customwidgets.fields.data.FontData`, problem: For input string: "normal"`
 `at [Source: UNKNOWN; line: -1, column: -1]`. I also tried switching everything under "default" to what's on the original theme with no luck
hmmm - I can try to help debug the issue if you can DM me over your portal ID? I can try to look at the code a little more directly.
